website_summaries.verdict: If you are worried about durability, this easy to use punch comes with a 2-year warranty.
pros: Double lever allows you to punch through difficult materials even if your hands are not very strong
Includes an awl and ruler to help you measure punch sizes
cons: It can be difficult to get the head to align on this tool for cutting, making it sometimes inconsistent

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good hole puncher and great suggestions from the company. The best one was how to sharpen the hole puncher: Long term maintenance: To keep the blades sharp, fold a sheet of aluminium foil so it is 4 sheets thick and punch about 20 holes in it with each sized punch. Repeat if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: P. Idoni

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rotary punch to replace a similar, mediocre punch I had so I could be more efficient and more comfortable when working with leather. The hole's it made weren't clean and the tool was awkward to use. The company quickly sent out a replacement but it was no better. I believe there is a manufacturers defect. I ended up buying locally. Look closely at the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's twisted.
customer_reviews.text: The head that carries the punches came twisted/canted. It is obvious when viewing the punch head-on. The punches do not meet the strike plate squarely, so they do not punch all the way through the leather. The marks on the strike plate also show this problem - the punches should leave circular marks on the plate. However, this punch only makes partial circles. Yep, twisted. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Caring Company
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and I'm really impressed with Skilled Crafter's customer service! I don't know this because I contacted them with questions/problems, but because they were proactive and care so much about their product that they reached out with a user's guide containing tips and tricks before it even arrived! I've used the leather hole punch on a pair of sling backs that had become too loose and I can't wait to use it more. I'm even looking for more projects just so I can use it again! It works very well with minimal effort and comes with several helpful tools as well.
customer_reviews.author: StephyB

customer_reviews.title: Leather hole punch — not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tool was not at all useful to me. The holes it would make would be way too large for the small strap on my shoe. The description of this tool made me picture it to have the capability of making small holes in leather. ‘No way would any of the punches work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Long

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good device, but the punch sizes are not marked.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good device, but the six different hole sizes are not marked. The company selling the device has apparently provided a "solution" in the form of tiny decals with the sizes marked on them that you can use to apply to the punch wheel to mark the correct size for each punch. The problem is, these decals are printed in SOLID BLACK INK on a TRANSPARENT (invisible) film background, and the punch wheel is SOLID BLACK. So after you apply the decals the sizes are printed BLACK ON BLACK and therefore invisible. No help there!
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Bram

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and makes nice, clean holes.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Skilled Crafter Hole Punch and it arrived exactly as promised, in a cardboard box which housed the punch, 3 spare punch plates, a clear 6" ruler, remover tool, and tiny screwdriver in its own plastic case. My 18 yr old daughter had no trouble punching nice, clean holes in the straps of several of my leather bags. The holes look exactly like the premade ones that were already on the straps. The punch seems sturdy and should last a very long time. I'm very pleased with this puchase and would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I sell leather belts at trade shows. Every so often, someone needs an alteration. I picked up this tool to help me with that function. I haven't really used it yet (not many trade shows right now), but I had an odd question, and I was impressed by the customer service response. It was quick, thoughtful, and they actually made an effort to solve a problem that was not the fault of their product, but they still put some effort into helping me on that. I'm impressed. Looking forward to putting this to good use when I can actually go back to earning a living.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It is Supposed to Do
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Made a couple of holes in a leather belt just to try it out and it works great. Nice clean holes with not much effort. Strongly recommend using the ruler and awl to mark you the position of your hole before you punch. Turning awl wheel from size to size requires some effort but that is necessary so that it does not move while you are using it, not the arrow showing the direction of travel. Also when you are done, turn the wheel so that it is in between awls so that you can close and secure the handles properly. No regrets on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue A Dog

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a LOT of money! - Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My wife lost a lot of weight recently during the pandemic by exercising. When she went back to dressing up once the restaurants started opening, all of her clothes and VERY expensive belts no longer would fit. No way was I going to rebuy these smaller nor try using a wide nail (as I have in the past). Read the reviews and ordered. Tested on a few cheap leather straps and finally sucked it up and went for it. Perfect punches! In fact, the holes look better than the original holes (cleaner cut). Last hole is the tool punch hole. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bad in Bahston

customer_reviews.title: punches great but not easy to use on thick leather like halters or stirrup leathers
customer_reviews.text: good quality product but not super useful for any thick leather like stallion halter or western stirrup leathers. There is not enough width/space between the punch and the plate to have thicker leather in place and set the punch. I broke the punch lock when I couldn't force the leather halter free of the punch.
customer_reviews.author: josefstuition

customer_reviews.title: Really feels well made. Appreciated the vendor email.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a couple of times, but so far it feels like a well built, strong tool that will last a long time. Made quick work of the holes I needed to punch in some fairly thick leather. The case, awl, and extra punch plates make this a really good value. I received a follow up email from the vendor with some tips, tricks, and suggestions. And really?? A 2 year warranty!! My $800 washing machine doesn't have that good of a warranty on it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Rugged punch that is rock solid
customer_reviews.text: My old adjustable punch finally died, and that was a lucky break for me because I replaced it with the Skilled Crafter punch. My old punch had loosened up so much over the years that I had a hard time keeping the punches in line with the anvil while punching through thick leather. The new punch is rock solid. It cuts through 12 oz leather with ease. The one thing I recommend is that you put a piece of scrap leather under the leather you're punching. That will ensure a clean, completely punched hole.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Beliveau

customer_reviews.title: The best hole punch I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I especially love the heft of this hole punch. Other punches seem to be made out stamped metal; they're flimsy, have sharp edges and are uncomfortable to use. The extra mechanical advantage afforded by of this well-engineered tool makes hole punching a breeze. Even large holes in heavy 15 ounce strap leather is a snap. I will never use any hole punch other than this one. Thank you for an excellent design at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Duckett

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for your tool chest.
customer_reviews.text: The hole punch kit includes everything you'd need to punch holes in a belt. It put holes in a thinner belt as if the belt was "like butter." When I had more difficulty with a thicker belt, I contacted the manufacturer. They were very responsive and recommended that I place a thin piece of cardboard between the belt and the anvil. When I followed their advice the hole punch worked beautifully. The challenge is getting the right spacing and using the correct hole size. But that has mostly to do with the belt owner's skill in using the punch.
customer_reviews.author: T. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Punches into leather smoothly
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to learn how to use it. The sprocket was difficult to turn to get the right hole. You have to by pass the base so you can close the handles with the clip at their bottom. The next time I used it I had to take it all the way around if I wanted to make the same hole. It would be easier if I could move it backward so I could use the same punch. WD40 my faithful tool loosened it to a manageable point.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this tool
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this tool. The punch would not cut square with the plate. I had to jam a piece of aluminum foil where the head locks into place to keep it in line, but by the time I discovered this work around, the punch hole was bent from coming down on the plate crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Scott Moser

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Extra info
customer_reviews.text: Things you may want to know: It feels heavy, durable, American made. Lots of different sizes for making holes in your belts. Has lots of extra tools. Good value. Extra info: I've lost weight, and have been using a drill and bit to make holes in my belts. Those holes don't look good and seem to ruin the belt. I wish I would have used this hole punch, it does a neat and professional job. Product link:
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: A hole punch built like that used to.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality punch. I expect to get many years of trouble free use from this tool. It has an exchangeable brass anvil plate that lines up squarely with the punch. The punch has a good throat distance. The handles give you enough leverage to punch large holes through thick leather. I was impressed with the instructions on how to sharpen the punches. All in all I like this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Olds

customer_reviews.title: Does not line up on punch plate.
customer_reviews.text: Does not line up on punch plate! I just tried using this today even though I bought it a few weeks back. So disappointed. The ones in the videos look like they line up - could I maybe get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: CWins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, worked great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I've lost weight recently and some of my old belts were too loose. Instead of buying new belts I bought this tool and punched new holes in the belts. It worked great. The tool is easy to use and cuts a very nice smooth round hole in the leather. This was much cheaper and more practical than just tossing out old belts and buying new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brook

customer_reviews.title: I liked this hole punchwhen I first purchased it  . . . But now - not much.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this hole punch - because of the built in mechanical advantage of the design. It has nice accessories and a booklet that was Emailed separately. I got it out this morning to put another hole in my leather belt. As I pressed down to punch the hole - the metal ring that holds the punch bits disintegrated!!! The tool is no longer usable. This is only the second time that I have used it. Very disappointing. Jim Barratt
customer_reviews.author: James T. Barratt

customer_reviews.title: Better tool than I really needed
customer_reviews.text: I had need to punch 4 holes to shorten a rifle sling. The old punch that I had laying around for years managed to get almost one hole. Ordered this one hoping to get the other three. This punch went through the last 3 like a professional tool. My wife now keeps it with her sewing tools so it will get used more from here out.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch cost a little more than I wanted to pay but it was worth it. I use it for many things but mainly for punching through 2 pieces of leather. It's like slicing through butter - it works that well!!! The revolving size selector clicks into place and stays there.... wrap your hands around the grips and light squeeze and bam! At first I thought it would be too large for my smallish hands but it fits just fine. Added bonus are the 2 replacement plates with screwdriver, an awl and small ruler. I picked a winner this time!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bastas

customer_reviews.title: Punches holes in leather
customer_reviews.text: In combination with ruler and awl easily punched new holes in leather belts. Rotated turret to find punch that matched existing holes. Used awl to remove punched leather from punch. Unit stores easily, but must rotate turret to a position between punches for storage. This actually prevents damage to punch & base.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: One hole! Only one hole in bridle leather and its crap! It will not work on good leather. The mechanism is sprung! I bought this to make belt holes on my high quality Filson belt and the tool and belt are ruined! Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Wyllie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make holes in belts
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdily constructed hole punch, easy to make holes in fairly thick leather. I initially found the hole selector wheel hard to turn, but loosening the screw on the retainer cog solved that. I wish there was a choice of elliptical holes too but there isn't enough space on the wheel for more punches.
customer_reviews.author: corkyjon

customer_reviews.title: Great Punch
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add holes to 3 belts which I had bought . The punch worked perfectly though I had to punch a few holes twice. Overall performance was excellent. I had tried to punch holes with another brand which failed but I decided to buy this heavier duty punch on the chance that it might work. I was pleasantly surprised when the first punch I tried succeeded and the following holes (except for three out of twelve) were just as easy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Matsui

customer_reviews.title: Quality-Easy to use-Quick delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: The Skilled Crafter Hole Punch is second to none! The different punch sizes lock firmly into place. The handles are easy on the hands when gripping and the tool edges are sharp. Leather pieces are easily removed with the provided awl. Don't spend your money on lesser quality. If a good, quick, clean hole is what you're looking for, by all means, here's the tool for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Flaw design
customer_reviews.text: Puncher looked used and didn't punch through soft leather, you can see the print mark on the pad is not all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Cyprus Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very solidly constructed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solidly built punch. It's built like equipment I remember from when I was a kid. The construction enables one to easily punch holes in leather which is the reason I bought it as I needed extra holes in some belts which I had purchased. I could have bought other belts, but that would have been more than the punch cost me. My wife suggested that I use a hammer and nail but that would have been more challenging to get the proper size and spacing. Beyond doing the belts I haven't had much use for the punch but it's reassuring to have it around when another occasion presents itself.
customer_reviews.author: J. A Winters

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use.  Very useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how excited I am to get this leather punch! I kept thinking I wanted one, but then would decided I didn't need it. Well, boy was I wrong. This works perfecly to put additional holes in my thick leather purse straps. It worked so well that now I'm going around my house finding things I can punch with this tool! My sons belts, my husbands belts, my daughters purses, all my purses.......on and on ..... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: HDMom

customer_reviews.title: This punch works great and is easy to punch through tough hides
customer_reviews.text: The punch is great. It makes it easier to punch holes in the thicker hides I have been using. The only drawback is that I have small hands and the punch is a little big for me so I have to work at getting it in the right place and holding it just right so I can punch the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H

customer_reviews.title: Works alright, may need several attempts to get clean hole
customer_reviews.text: Works alright, but you might need multiple punches counting rotating the punch to get a clean hole. The first punch didn't seem to go completely through, but after rotating and punching again you get a clean hole. It's simple to use, and works pretty well for the price. The punch plate isn't completely parallel with some of the punches, which is why you might need multiple attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Teguh Hofstee

customer_reviews.title: Money Saving Tool
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this a great tool to use not only for arts and crafts, but also for belts where the holes are not exactly in the right place. I had a bunch of belts that didn't quite fit because of the location of the holes. Well, I decided to use this easy-to-use Skilled Crafter to add more holes to my belts and now they look and fit better on my clothes; not too tight and not too loose. The bonus of using this tool is that I didn't have to go out and purchase more belts which means the Skilled Crafter has definately become a money saver.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: good punch
customer_reviews.text: Used for extra holes on my belt. Cut very well and clean - no fraying around the edge. I cut gently on both sides - hoping the punch edge will be sharper for longer use. It took very little squeeze to close the plier and the rotating head works well. The extra pads and screw driver are appreciated. Packing was clean and undamaged - better than some retail condition. The seller has a solid product and recommend the seller. Amazon should make it easier to locate the seller. If I click on the product, I go to general seller review page where I may have to scroll through pages to locate the product.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product to use for expensive belts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to have additional holes in my expensive belts and this tool exceeded my expectations! Of course I was scared of ruining my Gucci belts but after watching the video, tried it in a less expensive belt and it was very easy and produced beautiful, crisp results, I’m extremely please with the product. This will allow me to wear my belts different ways to maximize their use. I’m telling all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, well-made leather punch.
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to punch additional holes in the straps on a leather chef's knife roll case. It provided every tool needed for a professional finish. It is well made, sturdy, and should last a lifetime. I'll come back for additional tools when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Shoe Straps
customer_reviews.text: I have always had skinny ankles along with slender long feet , and as a result some of my shoes didn't fit well. At times I would find it hard to walk in heels because my foot was sliding around too much. This tool allowed me to punch the holes I needed within my shoe straps and now I can wear them comfortably without the possibility of slipping. It's no hassle I used it on five pair of shoes the first night and it only took 10-15 minutes. I hope this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: jonat

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great Hole Punch for Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I made a Kelly Anorak and needed to punch 12 holes in it for snaps. I was terrified....but this tool made it easy. It is well made, heavy and balanced. It cut through 2 layers of canvas and 2 layers of interfacing quickly and easily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Muccigrosso

customer_reviews.title: It was like butter! Good sharpness.👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this leather hole puncher a while ago and was finally able to test it out and it worked perfectly. I used it to add another hole in a leather belt and it matched perfectly to the other holes. So far so good! I would recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AmaE

customer_reviews.title: This is a high-quality, easy-to-use leather tool with multiple belt-hole templates.
customer_reviews.text: I used the punch to make new notches for my belts. The wheel stabilizer was difficult to remove, but I did that with pliers. I found the punch easy to use even though my hands are fairly weak. There were several different-size punch templates. I had to align the punch carefully to make the new hole line up with the others. I am not sure how that should be done - but it worked well. The punch is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A little lacking in quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought this on the strength of reviews and the features. Item arrived as scheduled, but the punch wheel doesn't line up with the plate, making the tool worthless as it will not punch more than a third of a hole. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Taw

customer_reviews.title: Really solid hole punch!
customer_reviews.text: I was easily able to make a hole in my leather western girth. I have horses and a good hole punch is a necessity in the tack room! This also comes with a ruler and an awl for marking your punch. Would definitely recommend this hole punch to anyone needing a sturdy one! Definitely the nicest one I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Need a better mousetrap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tool hoping that the extra leverage would keep me from straining my grip punching holes in leather. It performs well in the area of preventing strain. However, the replaceable base does not line up well with the bottom of the actual hole puncher circular blade, so no matter the pressure (or leverage) the holes are cut incompletely. Also, besides hand sharpening, there doesn't seem to be a way to replace dull blades.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gill

customer_reviews.title: Best hole punch I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hole punch I've ever used at a very reasonable price! I had what I thought was a very good punch for years, and when I couldn't find it I bought the Skilled Crafter punch. It cuts through the thickest saddle leather like butter. I would highly recommend this product to anyone for belts, bridles, saddles craft projects and whatever else you want to make a clean, neat, professionally done hole. Glad I lost my other one! 😄😉
customer_reviews.author: N. Pfamatter

customer_reviews.title: BROKE FIRST TRY. DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.text: DIDNT WORK FOR ME. BROKE FIRST TRY. IVE HAD THEM BEFORE. I KNOW HOW TO USE THEM. DISSAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star seller
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband. looked at a lot of these and bought this one because of the reviews and price. my husband has already used it and says it works perfectly. the shipping was very fast too. definitely recommend this seller and will order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: duches29

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this product because all the positive reviews state that it goes through leather very easily. I’m a quilter and needed a hole punch to go through cotton fabric and this did the trick. It went through two layers of fabric like butter. I’m thrilled and amazed and recommend this product to any quarter who needs a hole punch for grommets or eyelets.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a really good leather hole punch look no further. Product is excellent and performed flawlessly on belts and several other leather items. Clean crisp cuts and very easy to perform because of the way it works. There are even spare parts included with this item. The vendor followed up via email and wanted to make sure I had no issues with this purchase. I believe they actually care about their customers. Bottom line this is an excellent tool which should last a long time IMO. It's well worth the price............
customer_reviews.author: cthusker

customer_reviews.title: Something that finally works the way I want it to!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried every kind of punch, drill bit, drill press, awl, you name it, to punch clean holes through rubber coated webbing (biothane) with no luck. They are too hard to squeeze, or the holes are frayed, or just too much trouble. This one is great, very little leverage needed, very clean holes. How it holds up remains to be seen but extra parts that are likely to wear over time are included. It’s very cool that they do that. I’m definitely happy with it at this time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I make dog collars and leashes and needed to get another hole punch - you definitely get what you pay for. After a few punches, the ends of the punch tubes started to bend. After probably 50 punches, the tool became nearly impossible to use and had such a hard time punching the holes. If you use this type of tool occasionally it may last you longer than the 2 weeks it lasted me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can't believe I waited so long to purchase this! I'm a purse maker and have made holes for rivets and hardware by hand up until now. This tool is so easy to use and works so well I just might put rivets on everything going forward!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Need a leather hole punch. This is one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and well designed piece of hardware. The quality of this tool is great and perfect for what I need it for. It’s definitely a tool worth having and is capable of multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Merlintheone

customer_reviews.title: Good punch for many materials.
customer_reviews.text: Loosen retaining screw to enable punch selection easier rotation. Clean and accurate punched holes. I have a straightened large paperclip to insert through the opposing hole if punched items get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: The leather punch tool is good quality and nice and sharp. Punched a new belt hole easily. I would highly recommend using the spacing tools provided as I “freehanded” my first punch a little off center!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Casado

customer_reviews.title: Definately a quality tool!
customer_reviews.text: Got this punch for production of a new product of ours, so it's going to get a work out! This is absolutely a heavy duty punch that we expect to be using for years that has more than paid for itself in no time at all! Complete with tools and accessories, nothing else is needed. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Anne Becker, DVM

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY --  BEYOND ANYTHING WE USUALLY RECEIVE FROM SOME OTHERWISE GOOD COMPANIES
customer_reviews.text: This is the company we all dream about. They make a quality product with instructions in English. Spare parts ! Cuts through thick leather. Very careful packing would be adequate for glass,, and quick shipping. Company follow up with more data, and to be sure I am happy with the product. This is actually a 10 star company. The tool is as sturdy, and well made as it appears in the pictures. I wish they made more products -- many tools I buy are not the highest quality --- even though I buy the most expensive from companies in USA whenever possible. AY
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Punching the oposition down to size
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a punch from another competing brand. It broke, the axis of the punch became exaggerated and misaligned. When I wanted to punch a hole the wheel would roll backward, forcing the punch backward. Larger holes were better but same phenomena happened. This unit I bought looks similar, feels similar yet feels incrediblily different. It's movement while you squeeze the handles tells the story. Working with heavy thick 9/10 zo veg tannned hide. Cut through like a dream. Truth in advertising! It's so rare these days
customer_reviews.author: Saro T.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: high quality made, doesn't hurt your hand when using. However the holes do not cut threw. left a part of the material. i was able to take it out easily however disappointed. I was only cutting holes in a leather belt. Not sure how this will work on something thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sioras

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t punch through. Holes aren’t clean.
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing sucks. I tried multiple punch sizes on a 2mm piece of leather and didn’t get one clean hole. Had to tear the punched part off which looks awful. Literally the only thing this product should do, it doesn’t do.
customer_reviews.author: RubeBaker2

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I needed this tool to repair straps on summer sandals that had loose from the original stitching. It worked very well to get in the tight space! I love it! I saved favorite sandals! By doing the repairs myself and not needing to buy new sandals I saved quite a bit of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for aircraft repair work
customer_reviews.text: We work in aircraft repair. This punch is used to help in our job, although it’s not shown to be used that way, it is perfect and much more affordable than the ones marked specifically for our work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for thick plastic material
customer_reviews.text: This is one nifty hole punch. It's pretty amazing. I used it to punch holes on my car mat, through a quarter-inch thick layer of plastic, in order to fit it through some floor hooks. It worked great! Way above my expectations. This hole punch is awesome. I intend to use it for making holes in leather material later, and I bet it will work even better for that material. Overall, I think this is a well-priced tool for heavy-duty work. Definitely very useful and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: KentChewy

customer_reviews.title: Elated that I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it does exactly what I needed it for! It is easy to use and the extra tools that comes with it is a wonderful added bonus. I would recommend this product to any crafter.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bajan

customer_reviews.title: Good punch for up to 1/8 inch
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to punch very heavy leather. It is a high quality punch for material up to 1/8 inch thick.
customer_reviews.author: william a. wessels

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use on a new purse I purchased; I needed to add additional holes to shorten the shoulder strap. The hole punch worked beautifully on the vinyl strap, creating a neat, clean hole. Overall, it's very easy to use. The professional look to the new holes really impressed me. You can't tell my work from the factory work. I know I will get lots of use from this tool. I am petite and constantly have to adjust straps on handbags; I plan to use it on belts, too. This tool has opened up a whole new world of accessory-customizing for me!
customer_reviews.author: The  Amester

customer_reviews.title: Not all leather hole punches created equally
customer_reviews.text: So, not all leather hole punch are created equal! I had bought a much cheaper one and couldn't slice through the whole thick piece of leather myself. I tried many times and kept going back to it, and couldn't do it. I finally gave in and bought these. It was like I'd gained super human strength....but really it's these. They are amazing. I used it for punching holes in thick leather (back cinch of a saddle) and will now be able to do it with ease. I hardly even had to squeeze down, and with the others I was squeezing with all my might.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing. I was so pleased that the little effort needed to punch through several layers of leather and then through carpet. Buying another to have in garage. Great product. Even has extra attachments
customer_reviews.author: david k

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ones you buy in the harware store
customer_reviews.text: Punched large holes in thick leather. Tool was rigid in use and slugs fell through the die easily. Best hole punch I've ever had. Hardware type tools usually start to twist when punching large holes.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool, in fact surprisingly so. This is ergonomic and well engineered to do the job it is designed to do. The sprocket with the actual punches locks into place to prevent slipping when you are applying pressure. It comes with spare strike plates and is very comfortable to use. This is a nice piece of equipment that does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Butler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Is very easy to use. I was worried that it might require too much effort to squeeze the handles together since I have arthritis in my hands, but I was pleasantly surprised at how little pressure I had to apply to cut a new hole in my Dad's western belt. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fastest delivery ever and on a weekend
customer_reviews.text: The leather hole punch is a quality product at an exceptional price. The seller also provides information about how to use it in an email message before it arrived. This seller wants very satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal for a quality punch.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried this on 8/9 oz leather. The hole punched cleanly and easily. The punch feels robust and very sturdy. The handle is leveraged making it near effortless to punch. I’m pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for my purposes - excellent customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Best customer service/communication of any company I have dealt with - PERIOD! Have used only for leather - thick to thin and it works extremely well. Would buy again if I ever lose it. Very well thought out additional spares and accoutrements included with the tool in a decent cardboard container for storage - however, I have made a new holder our of leather for mine on my leather tool hang up that contains all of my other leather tools.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: i chose right!
customer_reviews.text: i chose this Skilled Crafter Leather Hole Punch from all the offerings on Amazon.com because of the reviews so i know how important & helpful these reviews can be. I used it to punch another hole in the ankle strap of my friend's sandal. It cut cleanly and easily, set on the smallest hole size (2mm), and through a soft-fuzzy suede-finished strap. I'm glad my friend gave me a reason to buy one of these tools and she is glad i bought it too! Also thanks to Gill from Skilled Crafter for sending the support documents and emails before i received my Leather Hole Punch. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Punch That Functions As Promised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to punch a hole in a leather holster that I needed to modify. Could have purchased a cheaper one and probably completed the job however I believe you get what you pay for. That is true with this item. It works flawlessly and I couldn't be happier. The results can't be differentiated from the original. I highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Acquired this device for a light leather project and general use for belts etc. I works as promised. I've been able to help friends too with their little leather chores. Thanks Loads!
customer_reviews.author: Chi_Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous punch. Wish i hadn’t waited to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Omg what a difference over a cheap craft store punch. This one goes through thick layers of vinyl and interfacing easily and the size wheel is easy to turn.
customer_reviews.author: sandbreese

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am an equestrian/ horsewoman. I have purchased a number of similar products from horse related catalogues. They were much more expensive and not even close in quality- they also rusted- thus my purchase of this product! This company is also VERY attentive- they emailed me with instructions and followed up with me. I am a VERY satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Janvier

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: After loosing weight, my belt size went down a couple of knotches. I either had to buy new belts or go to a specialist and pay $10 a belt for two hole punches, Not! This hole puncher works great! I was nervous at first because I have expensive belts and didn't want to ruin them, but this did the job and very easily. I like the adjustable sizes, they worked great. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: No more cobblers!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that during all these years I've been going to the cobbler to get belts punched. What made me look for a hole punch is that the last cobbler punched a hole that was too small and so it was impossible to wear the belt still. Punching holes with this one was easy and it did not require much force at all. It's a nice tool to have and I can think of many other uses for it. This one is of very good quality and sturdy construction and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beza

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy and easy to use. I love the accessories that came with it. I used it on my donkey halter and it did great! I only had to punch twice on one hole. The seller kindly sent a pdf user manual via email which I downloaded and will read. All in all for the money, I think this punch will last me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Leather hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This tool worked great on leather stirrup straps. Other tools I have tried were too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Caro Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great too to have at home (at a good price)
customer_reviews.text: Great tool at a great price for adding holes to belts. This allows me to custom fit belts which I purchased but became too large after losing weight. Additionally, I often buy bigger sizes because I like the look and length but need more holes. This works perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tillie1250

customer_reviews.title: The unit is made of heavy metal and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is very substantial, heavy duty metal and will punch through most any leather and cloth with ease. The unit comes with extra punch plates that also extend the life of the unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. RONALD MCCAFFERTY

customer_reviews.title: Great hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this hole punch, and I love it! It arrived in excellent condition with all the extra tools and parts, as advertised. I can't believe how easy it is to use, compared to my old punch. I make botanical lampshades, and may need to punch as many as 80 holes, through three layers of materials (fabric, acetate and styrene) in order to lace each lampshade around the top and bottom rings. With this punch, I can make beautifully clean holes through all three layers with one hand! Because it is so easy to use, I can work faster, and get a lot more done without tiring my hands. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: twojays

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When a belt just isn't right (yep, diet), you have to do something. I liked the choices of hole sizes and the durability of this device. I suspect I'll pass it on to my son (whose waist is still smaller than mine somehow).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Brucia

customer_reviews.title: Missing Awl Tool in the package - but seller fixed it
customer_reviews.text: Hole Puncher works great. I bought the complete case and all accessories. The only problem is that I did not get the Awl Tool. I did get a card in the case that said I was getting it for free. No place to find it. Product is good but incomplete. I used an small screwdriver instead to clean the hole Puncher but I am sure the Awl Tool would be more effective. I had to edit my review after giving 3 stars. As they promised they sent me the Awl Tool. It is very useful to mark and clean the puncher. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Visigoth

customer_reviews.title: But I like the puncher in general as it worked well for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hole puncher, so I can't compare with other experiences. But I like the puncher in general as it worked well for punching holes on my belt. The texture of it looks not completely new though. I don't know whether it suppose to look like this or it's a used one. The punched leather does get stuck in the punching tube and not easy to get out. It would be bette if an appropriate sized pin tool is provided together
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, no complaints (no major ones, anyway)
customer_reviews.text: Punches clean-edged holes in leather belts as described so no complaint there. The only issue is how to clear the punch of the leather detritus after punching a hole in leather? I had to scrabble around for a wire coat hanger to straighten out and push the leather detritus out of the punch. Outside of this teensy issue, it worked great and is a solidly built hole punching tool for what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love this hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I went through two other similar tools before I found this one, but I am a small person with small hands and pathetic grip strength so they were SO hard to use. Finally this one came along - I can punch through any leather I need to now. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zarquon

customer_reviews.title: Buy Nice or Buy Twice!!
customer_reviews.text: broke the first use, skilled crafter replaced it....when to use it again today...the replacement bent. this is a very cheap punch. don't wast you money. i ordered a what i hope is better one today...twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: hermit on the hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: My Skilled Crafter Leather Hole Punch arrived today and I'm very happy with the purchase! I got it specifically because I've been eating healthier & have exhausted the hole in my belts. It couldn't be easier! Clean holes, easy punch & feels ergonomically perfect in my hand. Haven't used it on any crafts yet, but I can already see it's going to come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: e22

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal. Been using it on 8-9 oz veg tanned leather and it has no problems punching holes. It's heavy, came with a ruler, and arrived in a timely manner and was packaged very well. If you are lookin for a holepunch for leather projects this thing does the trick. As long as the hole doesn't need to be in the middle of the piece you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Condor IV

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Would Not Turn - Stuck in Place
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this, but that wheel is stuck in place like cement & will not move. I don't know if it's true or not, but the item also appeared to be pre-owned.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and accurate hole punchers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel in my hands fits like a well crafted glove. Plenty of leverage to punch holes in the toughest leather with ease. The leather hole punch is sturdy well made should last many generations of grand children that I can pass it down to, I like that. There are many more size selection than I thought available. The sharp hole punchers leave a smooth fine looking leather after use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J. Wisner

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My brother used it on 2 different belts and it worked great! Lots of sizes to choose from. The only suggestion I have is if they can notched a # or letter next to each hole size - this'll make it easier to identify which hole you have tried and discarded to match perfectly to the existing holes on the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: A good hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Used to punch a heavy leather work belt, worked ok, had to use a lot of pressure to get through the belt. The tool seems heavy enough and can probably take a lot more pressure to punch a hole. I like the case that comes with it, keeps it organized.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Krywalski

customer_reviews.title: So easy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Leather punch is so easy to use and switch to numerous sizes as needed. The product was mailed neatly and compact. We use to add additional holes to the belts for children and for adults. We recommend this product to all who have a need. The cost is excellent
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH ROBERSON

product_meta.title: Leather Hole Punch by Skilled Crafter Easily Punches Perfect Round Holes. FREE Ruler & Awl Tool. Best Professional Puncher for Belt, Saddle, Watch Strap, Shoe, Bag, Fabric, Eyelet + 2 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: NEW IMPROVED DESIGN - Now available with punch sizes clearly labelled on wheel for quick & easy selection. Watch out for revolving punchers that are too weak to handle the pressure, not sharp enough to cut effectively, or break after just a few uses. THANK GOODNESS FOR THE PRO HOLE PUNCH! It works smoothly every time. Made from hardened hollow steel for EXTRA SHARP CUTTING and an EASY-SQUEEZE MECHANISM so no strength needed! This is PROFESSIONAL QUALITY making it stronger than many other brands.

DON'T TAKE A RISK WITH YOUR EXPENSIVE BELT! - Feel confident you can easily make a PRECISE NEAT HOLE with helpful tips from the Pro Hole Punch User Guide, ready for you to download. Relax and make your hole in exactly the right place with the FREE see-through Ruler and Awl Tool to measure & mark your hole position. The extra large punch plate STOPS THE MATERIAL MOVING WHILE YOU CUT, making it EASY TO PUNCH PERFECT ROUND HOLES again and again, without any damage to your materials.

NOT JUST FOR LEATHER! The Skilled Crafter Pro Hole Punch works with a huge variety of material including card, felt, fabric, tarpaulin, vinyl, paper, canvas, soft plastic, silicone and rubber. Perfect for horse harness, reins, sandals, bags, pet collars, store & id cards, grommets, DIY, crafts, and makes scrapbooking even more fun! It has so many uses you will wonder how you ever managed without it.

CHOOSE FROM 6 OF THE MOST POPULAR HOLE SIZES - This rotary punch can make 6 different sized holes: 2mm 5/64", 2.5mm 3/32", 3mm 1/8", 3.5mm 9/64", 4mm 5/32" and 4.5mm 11/64". The CUSHIONED HANDLES ARE GENTLE ON YOUR HANDS making it a pleasant experience for repetitive work. Plus you get 3 spare punch plates and FREE REPLACEMENTS should you ever need them, so you get FANTASTIC VALUE from this set.

WE ARE SO CONFIDENT YOU WILL BE IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY that we gladly offer you a 90 Day, No Quibble, Money Back Guarantee + 2 Year Extended Warranty worth $25.99. We want our customers to have the best experience and empower them to succeed. We use all our own products so we know what works and listen closely to our customers needs. You are in good hands.
